The classes
During pregnancy, you 
may be able to go to some 
introductory classes on 
babycare. Most start about 8 
to 10 weeks before your baby 
is due.
Classes are normally held 
once a week, either during 
the day or in the evening, 
for about two hours. Some 
classes are for pregnant 
women only. Others will 
welcome partners or friends, 
either to all the sessions or to 
some of them.
In some areas there are 
classes for women whose
